author: Adi Robertson
title: Twitter locks account encouraging coronavirus ‘chickenpox parties’
description: Twitter briefly locked conservative website The Federalist’s account for promoting an article about coronavirus “chickenpox parties” providing a solution to the COVID-19 pandemic.
content:
It bans content that goes directly against guidance from experts
Photo by J. Conrad Williams, Jr./Newsday RM via Getty Images
On Wednesday, Twitter briefly locked conservative site The Federalists account for suggesting people deliberately expose themselves… [+4133 chars]
